Articles.Content:
Hello!

   I am currently seeking a modder who can update the Telemachus mod for the latest version of KSP and make some adjustments. We are working on a social project and have a modest budget for this task. If you are interested, please contact me via email at [email protected].

Hi,

Is there a way to access the current fuel amount or instantaneous fuel consumption via the API ? Something like this works for the speed: 

// Java code
                        url = new URL("http://127.0.0.1:8085/telemachus/datalink?"
                                + "time=v.missionTime"
                                + "&long=v.long"
                                + "&lat=v.lat"
                                + "&alt=v.altitude");

I have tried 


                                + "&vFuel=v.liquidFuel"

but it is not available in the API.
